headline: Edison International Marks 20th Anniversary of Edison Scholars Program
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., April 07, 2025--Edison International is celebrating 20 years of helping to transform the lives of exceptional high school seniors who are passionate about making a difference in the world through science, technology, engineering or math (STEM) via the Edison Scholars Program.
